analysis.description:
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#681) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#892-905)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#907-918)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#983-987)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#682-685) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#983-987)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#953-965):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#964)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#964-965)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#786-838):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#794-806)
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#802-806)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#807-813)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#827-829)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#826-827)

BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(teamAddresses[i],allocatedBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#1256)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#1106-1127) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#1124-1127)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#1121-1127)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#640-642)
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#681)
Crowdsale.signerAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#682-685)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#63-64)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x6dc896e52def34ff23ab0b07250e12b9fd9fe9e7.sol#144)
